dcterms:description: A widely recognized benchmark for assessing the capabilities of various summarization models, particularly those designed to produce multi-sentence summaries from longer documents. The dataset contains extracts from the news articles of CNN and the Dailymail news channel, with approximately 90k documents.
dcterms:title: CNN/DailyMail dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Ao
X. Wang
L. Luo
Y. Qiao
Q. He
X. Xie
dcterms:description: A dataset and generic framework for personalized news headline generation, which includes various user modeling methods.
dcterms:title: PENS dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Bukhtiyarov
I. Gusev
dcterms:description: Datasets of Russian news used to fine-tune pre-trained transformer-based models for news headline generation.
dcterms:title: RIA and Lenta datasets

dcterms:creator: D. Gavrilov
P. Kalaidin
V. Malykh
dcterms:description: Annotated corpus from the New York Times used for headline generation, which combines the Universal Transformer architecture with byte-pair encoding technique.
dcterms:title: New York Times Annotated Corpus

dcterms:creator: R. Z. Al-Abdallah
A. T. Al-Taani
dcterms:description: Corpus used for Arabic text summarization, evaluated using the ROUGE toolkit.
dcterms:title: EASC Corpus
